artist: Artist: Nicolas Africano; Publisher: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; kneeling man; PL hand holding seashell to ear
inscription: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Chop
markings: LL: VEL chop mark; lower margin in pencil: [A.P. 5/5]
signed: lower margin in pencil: [Nicolas Africano 1990]; at top in grey:[Listening to/ a seashell./ Learning Patience]
title: Listening to a Seashell, Learning Patience, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
